title: Plutocrat

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Invest- (Night) Target a player. If they survive until the end of the next day, your factional Attack permanently increases by 1 tier.
Shatter!- (Night) [Cheat] Target a player. If they die, both of their direct neighbors, if alive, will be hit by an Attack 1 tier lower than your factional attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Ice Cold (Passive) If you are nightkilled, the killer will be roleblocked for the following two nights.
-Shatter! Only hits explicitly direct neighbors- if the target is player 9, it can only hit players 8 and 10.
